intent_atoms.description: Provide automated UI tests for macOS streaming of parse tree selection events in ParseTreeExplorerView
Extend ParseTreeExplorerView to accept preconstructed outline/detail view models via a new initializer, enabling test observation of production state wiring without duplicating logic
Automated tests must assert that the outline and detail panes synchronize around the default selection during live updates

Automation coverage should be reflected in status trackers and documentation files (DOCS/INPROGRESS/next_tasks.md, DOCS/AI/ISOInspector_Execution_Guide/04_TODO_Workplan.md, DOCS/AI/ISOViewer/ISOInspector_PRD_TODO.md)

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests
functional_units.description: Automated test suite that streams parse events and verifies synchronization of outline/detail panes during live updates

functional_units.name: ParseTreeExplorerView initializer with preconstructed view models
functional_units.description: Allows creation of ParseTreeExplorerView using existing outline and detail view models for testing production state wiring

functional_units.name: Status tracker updates
functional_units.description: Documentation and task notes reflecting new automation coverage
